author: aharui
msg: Remove waitEvent that was causing SWF to hang (SimulateMouseGesture doesn't handle timeouts properly).  I don't think that event should be there, and removing it cause the current test and subsequent tests to pass.

author: pent
msg: Set locale to null to avoid using system-specific date formats. In some systems a day may be "05" while in others it may be "5".

author: sebb
msg: target cannot be null here otherwise the earlier invocation of target.getPort() would fail with NPE

author: eclark
msg: HBASE-5458 Thread safety issues with Compression.Algorithm.GZ and CompressionTest
